title: I messed up :/
body: I bought Kassadin with RP instead of IP and i've already used my refunds, it's sad cuz i've been waiting to get enough IP to buy Kassadin so i could also buy his Cosmic Reaver skin, i've been so excited and then this happends :/ Do you think riot will be able to help me out?

replies.body: Would love to try and help you out! Let's get you over to our [billing team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to look into what happened and reverse this for you.
I bought it with RP by a mistake, wanted to buy with IP but missclicked cuz i got too excited and it went too fast :/
